input.sentences: today we tried to bake bread .
we used a variety of ingredients .
we dropped in some pumpkin for flavor .
output.sentences: I woke up in the morning and was really craving some pumpkin buns so I got to work.
I took out all the ingredients and things that I needed and started mixing up a dough.
I measured out the milk and oil and poured them into the batter.
Finally I added the only thing that makes these worth the time and effort to make them; pumpkin puree.
And with the magic of the conventional oven and time, I have made pumpkin buns.
